headline: Coterra Energy to Participate at Upcoming J.P. Morgan Conference
summary: HOUSTON, June 17, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today announced that Thomas E. Jorden, Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and President, will participate in a fireside chat at the J.P. Morgan Energy, Power, Renewables & Mining Conference. The fireside chat will begin at 8:00 AM ET on Tuesday, June 24, 2025.
